website_summaries.verdict: On its own, the Samsung Reality is a great midrange multimedia phone, but it doesn't hold a candle to the Rogue, which has a better design and better features.
pros: The Samsung Reality has an intuitive display, three home screens, a 3.5mm headset jack, a nice keyboard, and features that include a 3.2-megapixel camera, GPS, and stereo Bluetooth
cons: The Samsung Reality isn't quite as good as the Samsung Rogue, has almost the same design and features, and is also on Verizon Wireless
We also wished the photo quality was better

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this at all cost!
customer_reviews.text: This thing was garbage... I would not recommend buying this unless you wanted to have a headache for an afternoon. After spending over an hour with Verizon, and then an additional hour up at the verizon store, it was not able to be activated. The phone arrived covered in scratches, and in general was more of a hassle than anything. I'm not certain as to how I'm going to get that missing 3 hours back from my life, but, I'm sure I'll recoup that time from somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Dusute

customer_reviews.title: It could be better
customer_reviews.text: So when I was looking to order a new(used) phone the one that I ended up ordering said that it was a city red samsung reality in "like new condition". However when it arrvied it has a majorly beat up screen, the cover for the power cord is missing, when you look at the battery it has had water damage, in short it has had a rough life. Also it is Piano Black, not City Red which is fine but it would have been nice to know. It does work and with a new cover it looks fine. Still I would have rather spent $10 more dollars and had a phone that was in better condition.
customer_reviews.author: Siri Newcomb

customer_reviews.title: Review for Samsung Reality SCH-U820 cell phone.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little basic phone. It has a touch screen and a pull out keyboard for texting. I have only had it a couple of weeks but it is fine so far. It is small enough to put in your purse or pocket. I don't want a smart phone and this phone is exactly what I need. It does have a $10/month data plan with my Verizon plan but the internet on this phone is almost useless. It like the internet on all phones over 10 years ago before there were any smart phones. The phone came from the seller in almost new condition and was ready to activate with Verizon.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L - SC

customer_reviews.title: Samsung cell phone, used
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, easy to use, keypad is a tad bigger than some so super nice to type. Not sure I like the touch part but that's any touch phone. Miss the ease of the flip when talking cradled in my shoulder without hands. Didn't like that the headphones are different than the other phones we have. So now I need to buy one with a different adaptor. Also for some reason it won't find my bluetooth but maybe that's operator error. So far out in the middle of no where it seems to work as well as my LG which is a switch. Usually LG are the only ones I get this much service with.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished phone
customer_reviews.text: I like the phone, it's got a nice thin design. The color is pretty cool. The refurbished phone we purchased malfunctions slightly every now and then. I really like that the model has a "lock" button on the left side. I used to be famous for pocket-dialing, but with the lock button I don't have to worry about that! The phone is over-all good. I would not reccomend getting a refurbished one, however, unless you are a patient person. The customer service was excellent. The product arrived earlier than was expected. I would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca di libri

customer_reviews.title: Regret purchasing
customer_reviews.text: The battery life sucks. Won’t stay charged and the touch screen doesn’t respond well
customer_reviews.author: nikki matney

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a phone from here, because I needed a "new" phone since my old one died. The phone got to me a little later than the expected date, but that was because of the snow storms and awful weather (not their fault at all). The first phone I received didn't work. I emailed them about it, and they emailed me back shortly after. They sent me another phone (that works great), and a package to send back the other one that didn't work. Their customer service and response time is great. They were extremely helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: The first one didn't work, but they sent me ...
customer_reviews.text: The first one didn't work, but they sent me out a replacement right away, however, it was a little more scratched than I thought it would be but works well for what I need
customer_reviews.author: David Della Paolera

customer_reviews.title: samsung phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone came delivered as promised and with all the information on how to operate the phone and was completely satisfied with the packaging. Phone was in excellent shape and I would recommend to everyone needing a new phone to use this company.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline wynosky

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but only works under very specific conditions.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my daughter. Cosmetically, it was in better shape than I expected. Texting works fine. But to actually talk on the phone, it has to be slid open and it has to be on speakerphone. For a 13 year old girl who mostly texts, I suppose it's fine. I think I'll look elsewhere for her next phone, though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Daniels

customer_reviews.title: seems a little on the chintzy side but is still ...
customer_reviews.text: seems a little on the chintzy side but is still working after owned by a 12 yo boy for six months
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I received this phone earlier than anticipated. It has worked great as my port was damaged in my current phone and my upgrade date is very close. I am actually beginning to like it more than my original.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I did not like
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the size it was too smell to see
customer_reviews.author: Sky Rose7776

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Had this sqame phone before. Great reception and easy to use. Phone fits our needs.Would recommend to others. Nice color
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bobik Sr

customer_reviews.title: Great basic phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is wonderful for a basic (non-smartphone). I like the touchscreen as well as the mechanical keyboard so it is not difficult to text. I also like the fact that you can personalize it, unlike verizon's new basic phones they are now offering. This phone came here speedily and is very ajustable to one's preferences.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S Bimson

customer_reviews.title: We did like it.
customer_reviews.text: I have returned the phone, I took it to Verizon and they could not ACTIVATE. I really don't know why they said it was a new phone. We did like it.
customer_reviews.author: glennie

customer_reviews.title: ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: this phone is amazing and all but buying it used is nonsense. the battery is poor and weak and the charging port is damaged. the back of the phone is all scratched up so I had to buy a case for it. if you want to buy this phone, don't buy it used because it is horrible
customer_reviews.author: Olusola the seller

customer_reviews.title: and I am incredibly pleased with how it functions
customer_reviews.text: My phone arrived quickly, fully charged, and ready to go! So far I have had zero problems with it, and I am incredibly pleased with how it functions. This company know what's up in terms of great customer service/quality product! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca White

customer_reviews.title: Cool phone but missing some of things shown in picture.
customer_reviews.text: I received this phone quick in the mail and seem to enjoy it so far. I noticed that in the pictures listed that there are removable hard cases to fit it yet I never received these extras. I did get all the chargers which is important. Overall good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Cox

customer_reviews.title: Phone in very poor shape
customer_reviews.text: I chose this rating because I am severely dissatisfied with this product. The screen is scratched very badly and there is paint all over the keypad. I was not warned about this and am very disappointed in this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Grambo

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my 13 year old daughter. She loves it. Came in perfect condition and quickly. She loves the touch screen and the slide out keypad. Great basic phone!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Phone is great. Even had screen cover
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping. Phone is great. Even had screen cover. Awesome service.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A.

customer_reviews.title: SAMSUNG REALITY SCH-U820 CELL PHONE
customer_reviews.text: We rate this cell phone as good to excellent. The audio and video qualities are very good for a phone in the under $100 range.
customer_reviews.author: Al S.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Verizon Used Phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone is working great, I have no problems with it. Unfortunately there were more damages done to the screen than I thought. The screen has a lot of scuffs/scratches. The screen looks like a used screen protector that's been used for a long time. When I slide the phone up to get the keyboard it doesn't slide smoothly it's a bit ruff. But the phone is great like I said before. It works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Yosef

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Phone purchased from Ross through Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The phone did not charge on arrival, called Ross and they had me send the phone back. The lady at Ross was very helpful and I would buy from them again. THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lindholm

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had this phone for les than a year now .Suddenly, the phone stop working it does not charge nor power on. I will not recommend it to any body
customer_reviews.author: Marra

customer_reviews.title: Awsome phone!!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described in the ad. My son is super pleased with it! Nice phone for a 14 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: This phones battery and charging port is terrible . I put it on the charger at night and then the next morning I wake up and it's on low battery . I hate that .
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone.
customer_reviews.text: Phone was brand new and it works perfectly. Had the same phone before but it broke, but this replacement is just as great.
customer_reviews.author: JaviS22

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The phone posted didn't match what I received in mailed plus didn't get my money back
customer_reviews.author: sylvia

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT SELLER/PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Very HAPPY with the purchase of the Samsung Reality phone for my son. He had broken his 1st phone & he was not up for renewal for another couple of months, so we decided to purchase a used (not expensive) phone. Even though this phone was not brand new, it came to us in very good condition. He was very happy with it and we were happy too! I have always had great purchases through Amazon and will continue to buy items here. Thank you for the great experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Nice little feature phone...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this phone from Cellular Direct. Shipping was prompt, phone was new, as advertised, so I am very happy with my purchase. The only thing I didn't like was that the phone came with a generic charger (not Samsung made). Other than that, It's a great Mother's Day gift for my mom!
customer_reviews.author: Kameron Causey

customer_reviews.title: Great texting phone if you do a lot of texting
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone if you do a lot of texting but do not want intertnet access with the cost of data plans. It is also a good price at Amazon.com
customer_reviews.author: Glen Queen

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT purchase from JUST CELLULAR
customer_reviews.text: The phone was great for the first 6 months. Then it started doing crazy things. Taking pictures for no reason, volume changing for no reason..... So contacted the seller - JUST CELLULAR... They said, sorry, we only help you out for 30 days, then you are out of luck. I tried to work with them, and this is the email responce that said, Sorry to bad, can't help you. I will NEVER purchase another phone from them and will NOT recommend JUST Cellular to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: CreativeArts

customer_reviews.title: Its Alright
customer_reviews.text: I love the phone, but it is pretty fragile. I think that if I buy a case for it, I will feel much more comfortable carrying it around.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Better to just buy a new phone
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. Wouldn't keep a battery charged. Same problem I had with my other Samsung Reality. Plus, it was scratched and battered. Won't ever buy a used phone again. Worth the extra money to just get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Terilee Boyce

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: this phone works great. much better than any other phone that i have had. works like it should haven't had any problems and i don't think i will
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Davies

customer_reviews.title: Its was nothing like the photo
customer_reviews.text: They send me phone that didn't work&that was pass used,I had to pay to send them back&they took 14 more days to give me my money back they didn't ask me if they could send out new phone or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: unhappy
customer_reviews.text: The Phone Appeared To Be New ,But When We Plugged It Up And Charged It within Minutes It WaS Dead. Then After A Few Minutes It Would Show Full Charge Again. It Drops Calls. My 13 Year Old Son Saved His Money To Purchase The Phone. I Will Not Order Any Other Electronics From Amazon Again!!
customer_reviews.author: maw379

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Reality SCH-U820 is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I like this phone because it is similar to my Samsung Reality SCH-U370... (Which died a sudden death unexpectedly.) I did not want a data package and after numerous research, I almost ruled it out because everything said you had to have a data plan with this phone. But, one reviewer, helped me so much!!! He didn't want one either. Dealing with Verizon (which can be no pleasant thing...) can be challenging. But you can ask to have the data package dropped and a data block placed on the phone. Great phone...Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The phone was everything that my wife wanted and that is what makes it perfect. It is one of a very few phones that will work on the new Ford Sync system WITHOUT having to pay the phone carrier for a data pack.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first phone I had bought off line. I was very worried that it wouldnt look new and it wouldnt work. But I trusted the seller and read all the reviews and I am very very happy. The phone arrived as described by the seller. Looks brand new and I even got a phone charger with it. Very happy and I will order again from this seller when I need a new phone. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: but my dislike was that Verizon treats this like a smartphone
customer_reviews.text: It was okay, but my dislike was that Verizon treats this like a smartphone, when it is not at all. Another thing was the phone would not take my SD card. Not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much already told several people about it
customer_reviews.text: Liked it so much already told several people about it. very happy with price and item, hopefully this item will be around a little bite later other people have asked where from. Told them Amazon naturally .
customer_reviews.author: john bullock

customer_reviews.title: Decent, basic Phone
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and features. For a basic phone it performs as it should, and the slide-out keyboard is definitely a plus. Take note, however, some of the ads on this phone are less than clear. This is not a SmartPhone. But, for basic voice and texting works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Good basic phone
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a replacement for my 13 year old after his previous one was dropped from the bleachers and the screen cracked. Its a good basic phone with touch screen and slide out key board as he requested but isn't a smart phone, so doesn't require a data plan. Came promptly and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Beckie G.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, great texing talk wonderful picture messaging but no way to get the internet would explain its s simple phone but otherwise I'm keeping it its just not what I'm used to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Reality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. The keyboard is perfect for texting and the phone is very easy to use. Great for anyone not wanting a smart phone. Seller described perfectly and shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Q

customer_reviews.title: This a Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for a friend and he was thrilled to receive it. The phone, though used, was in excellent condition and my friend couldn't be happier! This Birthday gift was a home run!
customer_reviews.author: Katheryn M  Allensworth

customer_reviews.title: Good phone!
customer_reviews.text: Mother and teenage daughter already have this type of phone and they work well and are easy to use, so we got a third unit for another child. It's only 3G but that's exactly what we wanted. This new unit works as well as the ones we already have (which are 3 years old now - btw). Great phone!
customer_reviews.author: A parent Lee

customer_reviews.title: I only had this for a short period of time ...
customer_reviews.text: I only had this for a short period of time. I plugged it up to charge and when I took it off charge the inside of the port came out.
customer_reviews.author: Coolsmiles05

customer_reviews.title: Dropped once?
customer_reviews.text: With a case on, I dropped it once and the screen fell out. So unhappy I wasted my money on a cheap phone that was scratched up and half broken when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P

customer_reviews.title: Between a 3. 5 and 4. The lock/screen ...
customer_reviews.text: Between a 3.5 and 4. The lock/screen off button is in an awkward place. Arrived from seller a lot faster than was quoted which made my son happy
customer_reviews.author: Debbie A. Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone, it's one of the best feature phones out there. I was trying to replace the same phone but the replacement didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Munson

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I don't use the new smartphones - so this works for me
customer_reviews.author: wild dan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the phone. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: peggy

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter. This phone is good if you don't want a data plan (though you must go to Verizon to activate without a data plan). It's great for texting as it has a QWERTY keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: MCP CDP

customer_reviews.title: new phone,old plan
customer_reviews.text: love this phone. last of its kind, did not change my old plan, it is not a smart phone but offers 3g, touch screen and keyboard, internet,has great speakers, etc... so much better than the newer phones offered. that are offering less capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Wife loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery. Easy activation. Working as designed. Wife having a good time learning all the features. A nice little phone.
customer_reviews.author: Onlinebuyer

customer_reviews.title: alsome
customer_reviews.text: this phone i love its eazy to use i give it an A++ thank you for selling it to me thank you again
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Dunn

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting a Brightside phone, and when this came I was initially upset. The phone works great and I am getting used to it. The only thing I dont like is the additional ten dollar data charge that comes with it. I didnt want a data plan :( Thought it was a basic phone
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Sent this back
customer_reviews.text: sent this back it was even more crap then the one we had - seller shipped it fast though, 4/5 on shipping, 1/5 on quality. Defiantly was not new or like new.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Color blind
customer_reviews.text: I wanted and purchased City Red, I got blue. I just hope it works. Makes a good battery charger though.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Rhoades

product_meta.title: Samsung Reality SCH-U820 Phone, City Red (Verizon Wireless)
product_meta.description: The Samsung SCH-U820 Reality features a sleek slider style design. Some of the main features are GPS, polyphonic ringtones, Bluetooth compatibility, USB, voice dialing, touch screen, email, MMS, text messaging, music player, 3 megapixel camera, streaming video, video capture, games, and speakerphone. The Reality also features a QWERTY keyboard, web browser, and support for multiple languages including Spanish.
feature_bullets: 3G-enabled touchscreen phone in red with horizontal slide-out keyboard; easy access to social networking sites
Access V CAST Music with Rhapsody service (subscription and PC downloads); GPS-enabled for turn-by-turn directions; Visual Voicemail capabilities
3.2-megapixel camera/camcorder; Bluetooth stereo music; microSD expansion to 16 GB; access to personal/corporate e-mail services; full HTML Web browser
Up to 5 hours of talk time, up to 300 hours (12.5 days) of standby time

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars97 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Other camera features: Primary Camera: 3.2 megapixels, Burst mode, Panorama, Night mode, Frames, Effects, Mirror, Self-timer|Secondary Camera: 640x480
